title: Quick Creamy Potato Soup for Family
promptIMG: Instant Pot potato soup, on plate, natural food photography, balanced sharp focus, zero blur throughout entire image, infinite depth of field, realistic food textures, modern kitchen background in sharp focus, natural lighting, kitchen countertop visible, even focus distribution, documentary food photography, natural sharpness --no blur, depth of field, bokeh, over-sharpening, artificial enhancement --quality 2 --raw --stylize 300
description: This Instant Pot potato soup is a comforting bowl of creamy goodness that comes together in no time. Loaded with bacon and cheese, it's a family favorite that's sure to warm your heart. Try this easy recipe for a delicious weeknight dinner!
instructions: Set the Instant Pot to sautÃ© mode and cook the chopped bacon until crispy. Remove and set aside.
In the bacon fat, sautÃ© the diced onion until translucent.
Add the diced potatoes and chicken broth to the pot. Close the lid and set to manual high pressure for 10 minutes.
Once done, perform a quick release. Stir in the heavy cream and shredded cheddar cheese until melted and creamy.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and top with the crispy bacon before serving.
tips: For the creamiest soup, blend a portion of the soup before adding the cheese.

structured_content.content: This Instant Pot potato soup is a warm hug in a bowl, perfect for chilly evenings. Its rich and creamy texture, combined with the savory flavors of bacon and cheese, makes it a comforting meal that everyone will love.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 40 minutes
  • Rich, creamy, and loaded with flavor
  • Perfect for cozy family dinners
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Great for meal prep and leftovers

structured_content.content: Growing up, my family always enjoyed a hearty potato soup during the colder months. This recipe brings back those warm memories and is now a staple in my home.

• Main ingredient: Potatoes are the star here; russets or Yukon golds work best for a creamy texture.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Bacon adds a smoky flavor, while chicken broth enhances the savory notes.
  • Supporting ingredients: Heavy cream and cheddar cheese contribute to the soup's richness.
  • Equipment needed: An Instant Pot is essential for this quick cooking method.

upload.context: Preparation of potatoes and other ingredients for the soup.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Peel and dice the potatoes, chop the bacon, and dice the onion.
Cooking/Baking Process:
Cook bacon, sautÃ© onions, add potatoes and broth, then pressure cook.
Finishing Touches:
Stir in cream and cheese, season, and garnish with bacon.

upload.context: Cooking process of the potato soup in the Instant Pot.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Ensure the potatoes are cut evenly for consistent cooking.
  • Avoid overcooking the soup to maintain a good texture.
  • The soup is ready when the potatoes are fork-tender.
  • Store leftovers in the fridge for up to 3 days; reheat gently.

structured_content.content: This soup is perfect for sharing with loved ones, creating moments of warmth and togetherness around the dinner table.
Customize your soup with fresh herbs like chives or parsley, or add a dash of hot sauce for a kick!
Serve with crusty bread or a fresh salad for a complete meal. Pair with a light white wine for a delightful dinner.
Make it vegetarian by omitting bacon and using vegetable broth. For a lighter version, substitute half-and-half for heavy cream.

upload.context: Final plated dish of creamy potato soup topped with bacon.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Use an immersion blender for a smoother texture if desired.
  • Let the soup sit for a few minutes after cooking for flavors to meld.
  • Adjust the thickness by adding more broth or cream to your liking.
  • Garnish with extra cheese and herbs for an impressive presentation.

structured_content.content: Enjoy the satisfaction of making this delicious potato soup from scratch, and watch as it becomes a beloved recipe in your home!
